title: ‘Glamping’ with The Chedi Muscat, Oman
text:
‘Glamping’ with The Chedi Muscat, Oman ‘Glamping’ with The Chedi Muscat, Oman Details Category: Hotel   11:30 The days of hands-off holidays are quickly becoming a thing of the past, with adventure-driven trips and bespoke experiences enticing a new kind of traveller. Ensuring it stays ahead of the curve, The Chedi Muscat, Oman has teamed up with luxury travel explorers Hud Hud Travels to introduce the ‘Art of Design’ package, allowing guests to venture deep into the vast dunes of the Wahiba sands, camp in luxury under a blanket of stars and discover the rich Bedouin culture of Oman. 
Tailored around a two-night stay, the exciting package crafted by the The Chedi Muscat highlights the local art scene, rich culture and breathtaking landscape of Oman. Day one starts at the hotel, where guests can lounge by one of the three beautiful pools, dine at a choice of six exquisite restaurants and pamper themselves in The Chedi Spa with a 60-minute Ancient Balinese Massage. After a fantastic night’s sleep in a Deluxe Club Room or Chedi Club Suite, day two begins with an expedition into the Wahiba sands to explore traditional Omani villages, historic forts and local farms, gaining a unique insight into Bedouin life. Guests will have the chance to discover the secrets behind the region’s art before trying their hand at crafting their own bag using traditional weaving techniques under the guidance of Bedouin women. The journey then continues to a luxury encampment set in captivating surroundings amongst gently rolling dunes. Guests can enjoy a candle-lit dinner served under the expanse of the magnificent desert sky before retreating to the comfort of their bespoke Bedouin tent complete with crisp cotton bedding, Arabian throws and rugs, elegant furnishings and, most importantly, the sound of absolute silence. The next morning, watch the sun rise over the dunes whilst enjoying a lavish breakfast before venturing back to Muscat. Whether a lover of the finer things in life, an aspiring adventurer or a culture aficionado, this thrilling package will allow guests to enjoy a taste of the real Oman. Related articles
